item.description:
An outdoor gathering for grilling (vegetarian options as well as mainstream meats), merry-making amongst fellow non-believers from our organization as well as others, and various forms of outdoor recreation.

Do let me know if you are interested in attending, and what you might contribute to the potluck. We don't want to end up with forty-seven varieties of potato salad!

Parking is available at the Artesani lot. http://zakbos.com/art...
item.name: Boston Atheists BBQ
